mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pr_re_ed_time, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(pr_re_ed_time, '%m') AS month, DATE_FORMAT(pr_re_ed_time, '%d') AS day, SUM(pr_re_cnt) AS pr_re_cnt FROM sm_prod_result WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pr_re_ed_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND pr_list_nm = #{processNm}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pl_st_dte, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(pl_st_dte, '%m') AS month, DATE_FORMAT(pl_st_dte, '%d') AS day, pl_cnt FROM sm_plc_data WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(pl_st_dte, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND pl_cnt = (SELECT MAX(pl_cnt) FROM sm_plc_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(pl_st_dte, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'))

SELECT YEAR(a.mfl_ed_date) AS years, MONTH(a.mfl_ed_date) AS months, SUM(a.mfl_work_time - ISNULL(b.total_rest_time, 0)) AS total_real_time, d.total_mp_qty FROM sm_mf_proc_log a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT or_id, SUM(mfs_rest_time) AS total_rest_time FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE YEAR(mfs_stop_time) = #{searchCondition} GROUP BY or_id ) b ON a.or_id = b.or_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR(mp_reg_date) AS reg_year, MONTH(mp_reg_date) AS reg_month, SUM(mp_qty) AS total_mp_qty FROM sm_mf_proc WHERE MP_PR_STATE = 2 GROUP BY YEAR(mp_reg_date), MONTH(mp_reg_date) ) d ON YEAR(a.mfl_ed_date) = d.reg_year AND MONTH(a.mfl_ed_date) = d.reg_month WHERE YEAR(a.mfl_ed_date) = #{searchCondition} GROUP BY YEAR(a.mfl_ed_date), MONTH(a.mfl_ed_date), d.total_mp_qty ORDER BY months

SELECT YEAR(cs_reg_date) AS years, month(cs_reg_date) AS months, SUM(cs_work_time)AS total_time, sum(cs_qty)AS total_qty FROM sm_cut_sensor_data WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR(cs_reg_date) = 2023 AND cs_state = 0 GROUP BY month(cs_reg_date), YEAR(cs_reg_date) ORDER BY months
